Date: 02/07/2025  

Subject: Job Offer for Employment in the Czech Republic (Factory Positions)  

Price : 400 euro advance payment 400 euro after work permit $\mathbf{+}$ appointment 600 euro .  

Processing time of documents 1-5 working days .  

Work permits for 2 years .  

Good afternoon  

We are pleased to offer you employment through Da Dabi Global Solutions for factory work in the Czech Republic, with placements available at the following facilities:  

1. Ideal Automotive  

Industry: Automotive plastic components manufacturing  

Job Description: Workers may be assigned to any station, including machine operation or painting  

Shifts: 3 shifts, 8 hours each (overtime available)  

Net Salary: 150–210 CZK/hour (depending on process)  

Bonuses: Paid for overtime hours  

Accommodation: Dormitory-style, 2–3 people per room  

Housing Cost: 5,000–6,000 CZK/month (deducted from salary)  

2. Leifheit  

Industry: Plastic household goods (buckets, window tools, etc.)  

Job Description: Assignment to various production processes  

Net Salary: From 130 CZK/hour  

Accommodation: Free of charge  

3. Ami Auto  

Industry: Automotive parts production  

​ Job Description: General worker, assignment depends on production needs  

Net Salary: 130–205 CZK/hour (based on task)  

Accommodation: Free of charge  

General Conditions:  

Contract Type: Official employment via Da Dabi Global Solutions, seconded to the Czech Republic for 1 year (extension possible)  

Accommodation: Provided (free or paid depending on factory)  

Meals: Not included unless otherwise specified  

Workwear: Provided by employer  

This offer is subject to the successful completion of all documentation and legal procedures.  

Please confirm your acceptance by replying to this letter or contacting us directly.  

We look forward to continued cooperation with you and to supporting candidates in their employment journey in the Czech Republic.  

Sincerely,   
Koliada Zhanna   
Owner​   
Da Dabi Global Solutions  

Phone: $+48$ 575 893 411 Email: zkwork0409@gmail.com
